snippet: Federico Delbonis, 23, of Argentina won his first ATP title by defeating Paolo Lorenzi of Italy in the Brazil Open final in São Paulo.
abstract: Federico Delbonis of Argentina defeats Paolo Lorenzi of Italy to win his first ATP title at the Brazil Open final.
lead_paragraph: Federico Delbonis, 23, of Argentina won his first ATP title by defeating Paolo Lorenzi of Italy in the Brazil Open final in São Paulo.
